1.0.0.name: wordpress/playboard-android-channel-widget
1.0.0.description:
Express yourself with the Playboard widget by collecting your favorite apps in a channel and sharing them with your friends and the whole Playboard community. Playboard users will see your channels in the app or on the website (http://playboard.me), subscribe to them and can even go to your website for a full review. By using the Playboard Android Channel Widget you can easily showcase your channels in a beautiful way on your website.

The widget can be customized to fit any size and is installed as a Main Sidebar widget. See an example on the Playboard website - http://playboard.me/widgets/
